title: 关于精英怪mod掉落物问题
author: xieshiyu233
txt_content: 我们知道，精英怪mod的精英怪，杀死之后只掉铁装和锁链装，怎么把它的掉落物修改为不止会掉铁装和锁链装，而是全部装备都会随机掉落？

replies.author: Minecraft天兆
replies.txt_content: 楼主。精英怪mod本身不止掉落这些的，楼主可以自己再打打，会有别的好东西掉落的！

replies.author: 幽玄の槭樹
replies.txt_content:
打开config，然后找到InfernalMobs文件，找到以下：
 S:droppedItemIDsElite=iron_shovel,iron_pickaxe,iron_axe,iron_sword,iron_hoe,chainmail_helmet,chainmail_chestplate,chainmail_leggings,chainmail_boots,iron_helmet,iron_chestplate,iron_leggings,iron_boots,diamond-0-64
    S:droppedItemIDsInfernal=diamond-0-3,diamond_sword,diamond_shovel,diamond_pickaxe,diamond_axe,diamond_hoe,chainmail_helmet,chainmail_chestplate,chainmail_leggings,chainmail_boots,diamond_helmet,diamond_chestplate,diamond_leggings,diamond_boots,ender_pearl,enchanted_book
    S:droppedItemIDsUltra=bow,iron_hoe,chainmail_helmet,chainmail_chestplate,chainmail_leggings,chainmail_boots,iron_helmet,iron_chestplate,iron_leggings,iron_boots,golden_helmet,golden_chestplate,golden_leggings,golden_boots,golden_apple,blaze_powder-0-3,enchanted_book



是否看到上面那个“diamond0-64”?像那样修改就行了

replies.author: YXH
replies.txt_content: 不可能只掉这些还有金装和附魔装备 工具
